author: cezar
msg: Fixed a couple of bugs related to long CDATA fields.
XmlObject.copy() is unsynchronized if store is not sync.
Added XmlObjectBase._Copy(XmlOptions) and Locale.COPY_USE_NEW_LOCALE to create a new Locale (sync domain) for copyes.

msg: update javadoc and add Log for executeQuery() failures

msg: DERBY-1623: Add support for an ANSI TRIM function as defined in SQL 2003

msg: bug 5336: properly allow for no input specification to work as stdin
